name: Blind-Quest
description:
This is a basic text based adventure game. It is made with JAVA (Version 1.7) its been a work in progress for a few days.  I have basically of all the game logic done all I am doing right now is adding the story-lines and more content, scripting, etc.

Changelog:

0.21: First public release

0.30: Added more content still a massive work in progress but I have most of what I need. Just copying and modifying. Stay Tuned For More Updates!
